<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <identifier>

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1075</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Wacky Inventions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wacky Erfindungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Inventions farfelues</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Invenções Wacky</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Invenzioni Wacky</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Wacky εφευρέσεις</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Invenciones Wacky</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">People are always inventing new gadgets. Not all of them have been very useful and some of them are actually useless. In this activity the learners will be looking at drawings of inventions which received patents, many of which are both useless and strange.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lesson plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">interactive activity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gadgets. Wacky nvention</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leute erfinden immer neue Geräte. Nicht 
alle sind sehr nützlich gewesen und einige von ihnen sind wirklich 
unbrauchbar. In dieser Aktivität werden die Anfänger 
Zeichnungen der Erfindungen betrachten, die Patente empfingen, von 
denen viele unbrauchbar und merkwürdig sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les gens inventent toujours de nouveaux 
instruments. Pas tous ont été très utiles et certains d'entre
elles sont réellement inutiles. Dans cette activité les 
étudiants regarderont des schémas des inventions qui ont reçu les 
brevets, dont beaucoup sont inutiles et étranges.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os povos estão inventando sempre dispositivos 
novos. Não todo foram muito úteis e alguma deles é realmente 
inútil. Nesta atividade os learners estarão olhando desenhos 
das invenções que receberam as patentes, muitas de que são  
inúteis e estranhas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La gente sta inventando sempre i nuovi 
dispositivi. Non tutti sono stati molto utili ed alcuni di loro 
sono realmente inutili. In questa attività i principianti 
guarderanno le illustrazioni delle invenzioni che hanno ricevuto i 
brevetti, molti di cui sono sia inutili che sconosciuti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι άνθρωποι εφευρίσκουν πάντα τις νέες συσκευές. 
Όχι όλοι τους είναι πολύ χρήσιμοι και μερικοί από τους 
είναι πραγματικά άχρηστοι. Σε αυτήν την δραστηριότητα οι 
αρχάριοι θα εξετάζουν τα σχέδια των εφευρέσεων που έλαβαν τα 
διπλώματα ευρεσιτεχνίας, πολλά από τα οποία είναι και άχρηστα 
και παράξενα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La gente está inventando siempre los 
adminículos nuevos. No todos han sido muy útiles y algunos de 
ellos son realmente inútiles. En esta actividad los 
principiantes mirarán gráficos de las invenciones que recibieron las
patentes, muchas de las cuales son inútiles y extrañas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektionplan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">interaktive Aktivität</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geräte. Wacky nvention</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">plan de leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">activité interactive</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">instruments. Nvention farfelu</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">planta da lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">atividade interativa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">dispositivos. Nvention wacky</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">programma di lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">attività interattiva</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">dispositivi. Nvention wacky</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διαλογική δραστηριότητα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">συσκευές. Wacky nvention</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">plan de la lección</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">actividad interactiva</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">adminículos. Nvention wacky</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
